text: Nabii Qiisa:Yi-Rabbow atu gudduysiyyah yoo kah Amrisseemiy Yalla dibuk uqbuda usuk Yi-Rabbiiy sin Rabbi iyyaanam akkķe waytek keenik excem mayyu, anu ken addal Sugem fanah ken kee ken taamoomi yableeh dacrisa Numuh Suge, toysa Baaxô bagul Qumrik Sugu waah gide yoh duudusseeh nuwwuk Qaraanâ fanah fayya yoo hayte waqdi ken amol dacayrih atu Sugte, Atu Yi- Rabbow ummaanim yabaliiy yaaxigi kinnito iyye
